sn22.36:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā … pe …
sn22.36:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.36:4.4: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.36:4.8: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.36:5.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.36:5.9: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na taṃ anumīyati;
sn22.36:5.10: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:5.15: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:5.16: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.36:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.36:6.10: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na taṃ anumīyati;
sn22.36:6.11: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:6.16: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:6.17: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti … pe …
sn22.36:6.18: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
